info.title: Consolidation G/L Chart of Accounts
info.description: A consolidation G/L chart of account is a G/L chart of account that can be used for financial consolidation in group reporting. It can either be a G/L chart of account that’s been defined in an area other than group reporting, or it can be a G/L chart of account that’s been specifically defined for exclusive use in group reporting.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete consolidation G/L chart of accounts in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Master Data for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0336)
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
